description.value:
As an action, you can springlock your muscles into place, building up a tension that you can release at will to do one of the following "Spring" abilities. After releasing a springlock, you cannot springlock your muscles again until the end of your next turn.
Springlock Release: You can release your springlock to do the following:

  • Spring Jab: Before rolling to hit with a melee piercing, unarmed, or thrown weapon, release your springlock to add your Strength or Constitution modifier to the final damage dealt.
  • Spring Launch: On your turn or while taking a desperate action, release your springlock to launch yourself 10ft in any direction, even into the air.
    This trait can be used in water, and to launch out of water.
  • Spring Shove: When attempting to shove a creature or object, before you roll, you can release your springlock to add your Strength or Constitution modifier to the final roll.
